text: وقالوا۟ يايها الذى نزل عليه الذكر انك لمجنون

translations.translation: They say, 'You, to whom the Reminder has been sent down, are clearly mad.
And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.
They say: "O you to whom the Admonition has been revealed, you are surely crazed.
(The unbelievers have said), "You to whom the Quran has been revealed are insane.
And they said, “O you upon whom the Qur’an has been sent, you are indeed insane.”
And they say: "O you (Muhammad) to whom the Dhikr (the Qur'an) has been revealed! Verily, you are a madman!
And they say: O you to whom the Reminder has been revealed! you are most surely insane:
They say: 'Thou, upon whom the Remembrance is sent down, thou art assuredly possessed!
And they say: O thou unto whom the Reminder is revealed, lo! thou art indeed a madman!
They say, "You to whom the Reminder [the Quran] has been sent down, you are surely possessed.
And they say: O thou unto whom the Admonition hath been sent down! verily thou art possessed.
They said, ‘O you, to whom the Reminder has been sent down, you are indeed crazy.
They say: "O thou to whom the Message is being revealed! truly thou art mad (or possessed)!
And they say: "O you (Muhammad SAW) to whom the Dhikr (the Quran) has been sent down! Verily, you are a mad man.
They say: 'You to whom the Remembrance is sent down, you are indeed mad.
And they said, “O you who received the message, you are insane.”
And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
[15:6] And they, that is, the disbelievers of Mecca, say, to the Prophet (s): ‘O you, to whom the Remembrance, the Qur’ān — as you claim — has been revealed, lo! you are indeed possessed!

(And they) this refers to 'Abdullah Ibn Umayyah al-Makhzumi and his host who (say) to Muhammad (pbuh): (0 thou unto whom the Reminder is revealed) you who claim that Gabriel brought you the Qur'an, (lo! thou art indeed a madman!) who is inventing lies. 272

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } كيف لا نهلكهم ونعذبهم بأشد العذاب ولا ننتقم عنهم؛ إذ هم { قَالُواْ } حين دعوتك إياهم وإلقائك إليهم شعائر الإيمان والإسلام منادين لك، مستهزئين معك متهكمين: { يٰأَيُّهَا } النبي { ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ } من عند ربه { ٱلذِّكْرُ } أي: الكتاب المبين له أمثال هذه الكلمات التي نسمع منك { إِنَّكَ } في دعوتك وادعائك النبوة والكتاب { لَمَجْنُونٌ } الحجر:6] مخبط مختل العقل، يخبطك الجن، ويعلمك أمثال هذه الكلمات والحكايات، تخليت أنهم ملائكة ينزلون إليك بها، وإن اطلعت على الملائكة وصاحبت معهم، مع أنك بشر مثلنا؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جل جلاله: { وقالوا } أي: كفار قريش: { يا أيها الذين نُزِّل عليه الذكْرُ } في زعمه، أو قالوه تَهكماً، { إنك لمجنون } أي: إنك لتقول قول المجانين، حين تدعي أنه ينزل عليك الذكر، أي: القرآن
